downloadTitle: Building a Drop-Down Filter List for a DataGridView Column Header Cell Sample Code
downloadDescription: Windows Forms sample code for adding drop-down filter lists to the DataGridView control. This sample code is associated with a white paper on this topic.
detailsSection: Windows Forms sample code for adding drop-down filter lists to the DataGridView control similar to the AutoFilter feature of Excel. This sample code is associated with a white paper on this topic. For more information, see the associated Building a Drop-Down Filter List for a DataGridView Column Header Cell white paper. To provide feedback on this sample code and to check for updates, see the Windows Forms Documentation Updates Blog.
systemRequirementsSection:
Windows Server 2000 or later
Visual Studio 2005
.NET Framework 2.0
installInstructionSection: To download the Building a Drop-Down Filter List for a DataGridView Column Header Cell Sample Code click the Download button above.
